Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
After receiving feedback from ChatGPT, I feel more confident since I am afraid of making mistakes if teachers find them
                                .
But feedback from teachers has more insights and really works.
